name: John Hancock Global Technology Fund
tag_list: individual, corporate, institutional-clients, equity, income, international, sector-investment
overview:
For more than three decades, John Hancock Funds has been helping individual, corporate and institutional clients reach their most important financial goals.

When you invest with John Hancock Funds, you are investing with one of the most recognized and respected names in the financial services industry.

They offer equity, income, international and sector investment solutions managed by leading institutional money managers. They take a disciplined, team approach to portfolio management and research, leveraging the expertise of seasoned investment professionals.

Their shareholders come first. They work hard to provide you with the products you need to build a solid financial foundation. They believe in the value of advice and partner with financial professionals in a commitment to help you reach your long-term investing goals.

funding_round.source_description: Article: Gomez Raises $9.3 Million in Private Financing; Withdraws Registration Statement; Softbank Ventures, Inc. Leads Investor Group in Series D Financing.
